fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Education and training, Environment, Youth
eu_initiatives: As good citizens and with members involved in the EU Institutions, we follow EU initiatives and policies in the news. There are several special areas of interest for us: policies associated with refugees and migrants, and policies associated to freedom of religion and belief.
organisation_name: Pro-Cathedral of the Holy Trinity Brussels (HTB)
section: V - Organisations representing churches and religious communities
subsection: Organisations representing churches and religious communities
goals__remit: Holy Trinity is an international Anglican church bringing together people from over forty different nations, representing not only most of the European Union but many others besides. We endeavor to be of support to all our members and non-members, providing emotional, spiritual and pastoral support. Many of our members are connected either directly or indirectly to the EU Institutions and often call on us for support. To these and all others who might desire support, we seek to bring it wherever they are and might be in their time of need.
